Class Controller

    • game.Controller
  • public class Controller
extends java.lang.Object

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      static boolean blnHardDrop
      Static variable to determine if block was hard dropped.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Controller()  

    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method Description
      static boolean checkCollision​(game.Block blockCurrent, java.lang.String strSide)
      Checks collision of block on given side Block collision checks - Checks if sides of current block touching a block on specified side Wall collision checks - Checks if sides of current block touching wall on specified side
      static game.Block generateBlock()
      Spawns a randomly-generated Tetronimo block Uses "Bag of 7" guidline for randomly generating blocks - Shuffles all 7 block types before giving the player - Prevents getting repeats/lack of block types
      static game.Block generateBlock​(int intBlockType)
      Spawns a specific Tetronimo block
      static void hardDrop​(game.Block blockCurrent)
      Moves block straight down to lowest empty grid space on the BoardPanel Plays audio clip of hard drop
      static game.Block holdBlock​(game.Block blockCurrent)
      Hold the current block, returns a block that will become the new current block If no block is currently held - Generates a new block If a block is already being held - Swap with current block
      static void moveDown​(game.Block blockCurrent)
      Moves block down by one grid row on the BoardPanel If no collision detected, allow move down
      static void moveLeft​(game.Block blockCurrent)
      Moves block left by one grid column on the BoardPanel If no collision detected, allow move left
      static void moveRight​(game.Block blockCurrent)
      Moves block right by one grid column on the BoardPanel If no collision detected, allow move right
      static void moveUp​(game.Block blockCurrent)
      Moves block up by one grid row on the BoardPanel If no collision detected, allow move up
      static void rotate​(game.Block blockCurrent, java.lang.String strDirection)
      Rotates block in given direction on the BoardPanel Stuck check - If current block is trying to rotate into a wall or blocks and there is no space to move, deny rotate Wallkicks - If current block is trying to rotate into a wall, move current block in opposite direction of wall to stay inside the board Blockkicks - If current block is trying to rotate into another block, move current block in opposite direction of block to prevent overlapping
      static void updateGhostBlock​(game.Block blockCurrent)
      Updates ghost block to show lowest empty grid space current block can go down to on the BoardPanel Uses current block and moves ghost block down until collision

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

      • blnHardDrop

        public static boolean blnHardDrop
        Static variable to determine if block was hard dropped. Default = false.

      • moveLeft

        public static void moveLeft​(game.Block blockCurrent)
        Moves block left by one grid column on the BoardPanel If no collision detected, allow move left
        Parameters:
        blockCurrent - Current block you want to move left

      • moveRight

        public static void moveRight​(game.Block blockCurrent)
        Moves block right by one grid column on the BoardPanel If no collision detected, allow move right
        Parameters:
        blockCurrent - Current block you want to move right

        public static void moveDown​(game.Block blockCurrent)
        Moves block down by one grid row on the BoardPanel If no collision detected, allow move down
        Parameters:
        blockCurrent - Current block you want to move down

      • moveUp

        public static void moveUp​(game.Block blockCurrent)
        Moves block up by one grid row on the BoardPanel If no collision detected, allow move up
        Parameters:
        blockCurrent - Current block you want to move up

      • checkCollision

        public static boolean checkCollision​(game.Block blockCurrent,
                                     java.lang.String strSide)
        Checks collision of block on given side Block collision checks - Checks if sides of current block touching a block on specified side Wall collision checks - Checks if sides of current block touching wall on specified side
        Parameters:
        blockCurrent - Current block you want to check for collision on
        strSide - Direction to check for collision ("up", "right", "left", "down")
        Returns:
        Returns true if collision detected

      • hardDrop

        public static void hardDrop​(game.Block blockCurrent)
        Moves block straight down to lowest empty grid space on the BoardPanel Plays audio clip of hard drop
        Parameters:
        blockCurrent - Current block you want to drop to lowest empty grid space

      • updateGhostBlock

        public static void updateGhostBlock​(game.Block blockCurrent)
        Updates ghost block to show lowest empty grid space current block can go down to on the BoardPanel Uses current block and moves ghost block down until collision
        Parameters:
        blockCurrent - Current block you want the ghost block to use for update

      • holdBlock

        public static game.Block holdBlock​(game.Block blockCurrent)
        Hold the current block, returns a block that will become the new current block If no block is currently held - Generates a new block If a block is already being held - Swap with current block
        Parameters:
        blockCurrent - Current block you want to hold
        Returns:
        Returns either a new block or the block currently being held

      • rotate

        public static void rotate​(game.Block blockCurrent,
                          java.lang.String strDirection)
        Rotates block in given direction on the BoardPanel Stuck check - If current block is trying to rotate into a wall or blocks and there is no space to move, deny rotate Wallkicks - If current block is trying to rotate into a wall, move current block in opposite direction of wall to stay inside the board Blockkicks - If current block is trying to rotate into another block, move current block in opposite direction of block to prevent overlapping
        Parameters:
        blockCurrent - Current block you want to rotate
        strDirection - Direction to rotate block in ("left", "right")

      • generateBlock

        public static game.Block generateBlock()
        Spawns a randomly-generated Tetronimo block Uses "Bag of 7" guidline for randomly generating blocks - Shuffles all 7 block types before giving the player - Prevents getting repeats/lack of block types
        Returns:
        Returns newly created Tetronimo block

      • generateBlock

        public static game.Block generateBlock​(int intBlockType)
        Spawns a specific Tetronimo block
        Parameters:
        intBlockType - Type of block you want to generate (final types specified in Block class)
        Returns:
        Returns newly created Tetronimo block
